products.title: IPod Maño - 8PB
products.body_html: It's the small iPod with one very big idea: Carrying files like an animal. Now the world's most popular music player, available in 8PB models, lets you enjoy TV shows, movies, video podcasts, and more. The larger, brighter display means amazing picture quality. In six eye-catching colors, iPod Maño is stunning all around. And with models starting at just $149, little speaks volumes.

products.title: McBook Er?
products.body_html: McBook Er surpasses its previous model by removing the thunderbolt 3 port and adding the ultrafast Stormybolt 1. Conversors from USB -> Thunderbolt 3 -> Stormybolt 1 are sold separately.

products.title: iPhone 8
products.body_html: The iPhone8 introduces improved voice recognition. Siri is replaced with Chari and introduces amazing capabilities such as the interpretation of commands like 'tira pa casa' (Maps to home) or 'vente pacá' (share your location).
